resources.string:
v1 
2 Feb 2010 

Given Latitude and Longitude, calculate Geocentric Datum of Australia (GDA). 

Warning: This application has not been thoroughly tested and might provide wrong data. 
Results can be verified at http://www.ga.gov.au/geodesy/datums/redfearn_geo_to_grid.jsp 

Based on 
http://nuffcumptin.com/projects/redfearn/redfearnsformulas.php and 
http://pastebin.com/iRb2V8cw 

Coming: reverse calculation, AGD, location from GPS, better gui 

Please send comments and suggestions to ales@lichner.name
